Verses: 1 poorvakaalangalil Pangupangaagavum Vagaivagaiyaagavum, Theerkkadharisigal Moolamaaip Pidhaakkalukkuth Thiruvulampatrina Dhevan,
2 indhak Kadaisi Naatkalil Kumaaran Moolamaai Namakkuth Thiruvulampatrinaar; Ivaraich Sarvaththukkum Sudhandharavaaliyaaga Niyamiththaar, Ivaraikkondu Ulagangalaiyum Undaakkinaar.

3 ivar Avarudaiya Magimaiyin Piragaasamum, Avarudaiya Thanmaiyin Soroobamumaayirundhu, Sarvaththaiyum Thammudaiya Vallamaiyulla Vasanaththinaale Thaangugiravaraai, Thammaaledhaame Nammudaiya Paavangalai Neekkum Suththigarippai Undupanni, Unnadhaththilulla Magaththuvamaanavarudaiya Valadhupaarisaththile Utkaarndhaar.
4 ivar Dhevathoodharaippaarkkilum Evvalavu Viseshiththa Naamaththaich Sudhandhariththukkondaaro, Avvalavu Adhigamaai Avargalilum Menmaiyullavaraanaar.

5 eppadiyenil, Neer Ennudaiya Kumaaran, Indru Naan Ummai Jenippiththen Endrum; Naan Avarukkup Pidhaavaayiruppen, Avar Enakkuk Kumaaranaayiruppaar Endrum, Avar Thoodhargalil Yaarukkaavadhu Eppodhaagilum Sonnadhundaa?
6 melum, Thamadhu Mudharperaanavarai Ulagaththil Piravesikkachseydhapodhu: Dhevadhoodhar Yaavarum Avaraith Thozhudhukollakkadavargal Endraar.
7 dhevadhoodharaikkuriththo Thammudaiya Thoodhargalaik Kaatrugalaagavum, Thammudaiya Oozhiyakkaararai Akkinijuvaalaigalaagavum Seygiraar Endru Solliyirukkiradhu.
8 kumaaranai Nokki: Dhevane, Ummudaiya Singaasanam Endrendraikkumulladhu, Ummudaiya Raajyaththin Sengol Needhiyulla Sengolaayirukkiradhu.
9 neer Needhiyai Virumbi, Akkiramaththai Veruththirukkireer; Aadhalaal, Dhevane, Ummudaiya Dhevan Umadhu Thozharaippaarkkilum Ummai Aanandha Thailaththinaal Abishekampanninaar Endrum;
10 karththaave, Neer Aadhiyile Boomiyai Asdhipaarappaduththineer; Vaanangalum Ummudaiya Karaththin Kiriyaigalaayirukkiradhu;
11 avaigal Azhindhupom; Neero Nilaiththiruppeer; Avaigalellaam Vasthirampolap Pazhaimaiyaaippom;
12 oru Saalvaiyaippola Avaigalaich Suruttuveer, Appozhudhu Maarippom; Neero Maaraadhavaraayirukkireer, Ummudaiya Aandugal Mudindhupovadhillai Endrum Solliyirukkiradhu.
13 melum, Naan Ummudaiya Saththurukkalai Umakkup Paadhapadiyaakkippodumvaraikkum Neer Ennudaiya Valadhupaarisaththil Utkaarum Endru Dhoodhargalil Yaarukkaavadhu Eppodhaagilum Avar Sonnadhundaa?
14 ratchippaich Sudhandharikkappogiravargalinimiththamaaga Oozhiyanjseyyumpadikku Avargalellaarum Anuppappadum Panividai Aavigalaayirukkiraargalallavaa?
